name: Grey Wolf Award
description: The highest achievement badge a Cub Scout can earn. Requires completion of Milestone 3, six SIA projects, OAS Stage 3 in Core Disciplines plus eight total progressions, Adventurous Journey, Leadership Course, and personal reflection.

name: Milestone 1
description: First milestone badge obtained by completing a set number of participates, assists, and leads of activities, plus personal reflection. Typically completed by age 8.

name: Milestone 2
description: Second milestone badge obtained by completing a set number of participates, assists, and leads of activities, plus personal reflection. Typically completed by age 9-10.

name: Milestone 3
description: Third milestone badge obtained by completing a set number of participates, assists, and leads of activities, plus personal reflection. Required for Grey Wolf Award. Typically completed by age 11.
